hero.title: All the tools you need to enable
hero.description: Convert, merge, split, and edit PDF files effortlessly. 100% free and secure processing directly in your browser.

toolsPage.siteTitle: PDFToolskit - All Tools For Every PDF Need
toolsPage.title: PDF Tools
toolsPage.subtitle: Browse all our free PDF tools in one place
toolsPage.noTools: No tools found in this category.

toolsSection.title: All PDF Tools You Need
toolsSection.subtitle: Process your PDFs instantly with our suite of professional tools. Fast, secure, and completely free.

features.title: Why Choose PDFToolskit?
features.subtitle: Built with modern web technology to give you the best PDF experience possible.
features.fastDesc: Process PDFs instantly with client-side processing. No server delays, no waiting.
features.secureDesc: Your files never leave your device. All processing happens locally in your browser.
features.freeDesc: All tools are free forever. No hidden charges, no subscriptions, no limits.
features.unlimitedDesc: Process as many files as you want. No daily limits, no file size restrictions.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Choose any tool above and start processing your PDFs instantly. No sign-up required.

footer.description: Free, fast, and secure PDF tools. Process your documents directly in your browser - no uploads, no tracking, 100% private.
footer.builtBy: Built with ❤️ by Saif Qadri for everyone.

tools.mergePdfDesc: Combine multiple PDF files into one document
tools.splitPdfDesc: Extract pages from your PDF document
tools.compressPdfDesc: Reduce PDF file size while maintaining quality
tools.pdfToJpgDesc: Convert PDF pages to high-quality images
tools.rotatePdfDesc: Rotate PDF pages to the correct orientation
tools.removePagesDesc: Delete unwanted pages from your PDF
tools.protectPdfDesc: Secure PDF files with password encryption
tools.pdfToWordDesc: Convert PDF documents to editable Word files
tools.extractPagesDesc: Create a new PDF with specific pages
tools.addPageNumbersDesc: Insert page numbers with custom positioning
tools.addWatermarkDesc: Stamp text watermarks on your documents
tools.cropPdfDesc: Trim margins from your PDF pages
tools.signPdfDesc: Add your signature to PDF documents
tools.ocrPdfDesc: Extract text from scanned PDFs and Images
tools.pdfToExcelDesc: Convert PDF tables to editable Excel spreadsheets
tools.excelToPdfDesc: Convert Excel spreadsheets to professional PDFs
tools.pdfToPowerPointDesc: Convert PDF slides to editable PowerPoint
tools.htmlToPdfDesc: Convert web pages and HTML to PDF
tools.editPdfDesc: Edit text, add images, and annotate PDFs
tools.chatPdfDesc: Ask questions and extract insights from your PDF using AI
tools.masterOrganizerDesc: Unified UI to Reorder, Rotate and Delete pages
tools.metadataAuditorDesc: Inspect and wipe hidden tracking data
tools.wordToPdfDesc: Convert Word documents to PDF format
tools.pdfADesc: Convert PDF to long-term archiving format

merge.title: Merge PDF Files
merge.description: Combine multiple PDF documents into one file. Fast, secure, and completely free.
merge.orderHint: Files will be merged in the order shown above

compress.title: Compress PDF
compress.description: Optimize your PDF files with smart compression.
compress.extremeDesc: Less quality, high compression. Perfect for heavy files.
compress.recommendedDesc: Good quality, good compression. Best for most files.
compress.lessDesc: High quality, less compression. Ideal for images.
compress.customDesc: Set a target file size limit (e.g. 5MB).
compress.customLimitHint: *May use aggressive processing to meet limit.
compress.completeSub: Your PDF is now lighter and ready to download.

relatedTools.title: Explore Other Tools
relatedTools.subtitle: Discover more ways to manage your PDF files

hero.title: Privacy-First PDF Tools
hero.subtitle: PDFToolskit was built with a simple but powerful mission: To provide world-class PDF tools that respect your privacy and never touch our servers.

zeroServer.title: The Zero-Server Model
zeroServer.content: Most online PDF tools upload your sensitive documents to their servers for processing. At PDFToolskit, we believe your files should stay where they belong: **on your device**.
zeroServer.subContent: Using advanced WebAssembly (WASM) technology, we bring the processing power of professional PDF libraries directly into your browser. This means 100% privacy and zero risk of data leaks.

speed.title: Lightning Fast Speed
speed.content: By eliminating the need to upload and download large files, PDFToolskit processes your documents instantly. Small or large, your tasks are completed in milliseconds.

ai.title: Secure AI Integration
ai.subtitle: Next-generation AI features that don't compromise security.

local.title: Local Learning
local.desc: Our summary and scanning tools run light AI models entirely in your browser memory.

training.title: No Training Data
training.desc: We never use your documents to train models. Your intent and data are strictly yours.

private.title: Private-by-Design
private.desc: Every feature is audited to ensure it adheres to our Zero-Server manifesto.

cta.title: Ready to process some files?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who trust PDFToolskit for their most sensitive document workflows.
